description:
This is a short (1 hr) hike from the Whistler Roundhouse (top of the Gondola) to the Peak (rather than taking the chair).

It includes a short detour to Plantman Geocache # 9 (see www.geocaching.com).

At the peak, there is also a micro cache.

3.2 kms, el gain of 350 m.
directions: Take the Whistler Gondola to the Roundhouse. Instead of taking the chair to the Peak, hike up, OR, take the chair to the Peak, and walk down,
title: Whistler - Roundhouse to Peak
